content:
A mixture of Cd(NO3)2·6H2O (29.7 mg, 0.1 mmol), HL (12.7 mg, 0.05 mmol), H2PBEA (8.7 mg, 0.05 mmol), NaOH (6.0 mg, 0.15 mmol), and H2O (10 mL) was sealed in a 16 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel container and heated at 180 °C for 3 d. Complex 1 was isolated from the mixture in colorless block crystalline form by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 14.87 mg (0.031 mmol, 62%). Anal. Calcd for C18H15CdN4O5 (%): C, 45.06; H, 3.15; N, 11.68. Found: C, 45.10; H, 3.11; N, 11.64. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3446(br,s), 1587(s) 1565(s), 1508(s), 1400(s), 1365(s), 1259(w), 1242(m), 1144(m), 1175(w), 1066(m), 1015(w), 934(m), 878(w), 821(w), 759(m), 721(m), 673(w), 644(m), 587(w).

Preparation of [Cd<sub>2</sub>(μ<sub>3</sub>-OH)(L)(PBEA)] (<bold>2</bold>)

Complex 2 was synthesized by the same procedure as for the preparation of 1, except that CdCl2·2.5H2O (22.8 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2·6H2O as the starting material. Colorless block crystals of 2 were isolated by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 19.24 mg (0.028 mmol, 56%). Anal. Calcd for C23H18Cd2N4O7 (%): C, 40.20; H, 2.64; N, 8.15. Found: C, 40.17; H, 2.66; N, 8.11. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3443(br), 1586(s), 1571(s), 1505(s), 1400(s), 1384(s), 1331(w), 1241(m), 1144(w), 1114(w), 1066(m), 1014(w), 933(m), 823(w), 782(w), 756(m), 721(m), 674(w), 644(m), 587(w).

Preparation of [Cd<sub>3</sub>(μ<sub>3</sub>-OH)(L)<sub>2</sub>(PBEA)<sub>1.5</sub>]·H<sub>2</sub>O (<bold>3</bold>)

Complex 3 was also synthesized by the same procedure as for the preparation of 1, except that CdSO4·8/3H2O (25.6 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2·6H2O as the starting material. Colorless block crystals of 3 were obtained by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 21.00 mg (0.018 mmol, 54%). Anal. Calcd for C41H33Cd3N8O12 (%): C, 42.20; H, 2.85; N, 9.60. Found: C, 41.55; H, 2.91; N, 9.42. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3446(br), 1584(s), 1568(s), 1506(s), 1396(s), 1364(s), 1330(w), 1267(w), 1240(m), 1114(w), 1067(m), 1059(m), 1016(m), 932(m), 826(w), 786(m), 758(w), 736(m), 703(w), 647(m), 587(w).

Preparation of [Mn(μ<sub>2</sub>-H<sub>2</sub>O)(L)(PBEA)<sub>0.5</sub>] (<bold>4</bold>)

Complex 4 was synthesized by the same procedure as that used for preparation of 1, except that MnCl2·4H2O (19.7 mg, 0.1 mmol), Mn(NO3)2·4H2O (25.1 mg, 0.1 mmol), or MnSO4·H2O (16.9 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2·6H2O as the starting material. Pink block crystals of 4 were isolated from the mixture by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 27.69 mg (0.034 mmol, 67%) for MnCl2·4H2O, 20.66 mg (0.025 mmol, 50%) for Mn(NO3)2·4H2O and 21.90 mg (0.027 mmol, 53%) for MnSO4·H2O, respectively. Anal. Calcd for C36H28Mn2N8O9 (%): C, 52.31; H, 3.41; N, 13.56. Found: C, 52.34; H, 3.40; N, 13.52. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3431(br), 1639(s), 1590(s), 1501(s), 1407(s), 1384(s), 1372(s), 1302(m), 1267(m), 1231(m), 1107(w), 1069(s), 1014(w), 927(m), 830(w), 813(w), 773(w), 705(m), 655(w), 601(w).

Preparation of [Cd(L)(PBEA)0.5]⋅H2O (1)

A mixture of Cd(NO3)2⋅6H2O (29.7 mg, 0.1 mmol), HL (12.7 mg, 0.05 mmol), H2PBEA (8.7 mg, 0.05 mmol), NaOH (6.0 mg, 0.15 mmol), and H2O (10 mL) was sealed in a 16 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel container and heated at 180 °C for 3 d. Complex 1 was isolated from the mixture in colorless block crystalline form by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 14.87 mg (0.031 mmol, 62%). Anal. Calcd for C18H15CdN4O5 (%): C, 45.06; H, 3.15; N, 11.68. Found: C, 45.10; H, 3.11; N, 11.64. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3446(br,s), 1587(s) 1565(s), 1508(s), 1400(s), 1365(s), 1259(w), 1242(m), 1144(m), 1175(w), 1066(m), 1015(w), 934(m), 878(w), 821(w), 759(m), 721(m), 673(w), 644(m), 587(w).

Complex 2 was synthesized by the same procedure as for the preparation of 1, except that CdCl2⋅2.5H2O (22.8 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2⋅6H2O as the starting material. Colorless block crystals of 2 were isolated by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 19.24 mg (0.028 mmol, 56%). Anal. Calcd for C23H18Cd2N4O7 (%): C, 40.20; H, 2.64; N, 8.15. Found: C, 40.17; H, 2.66; N, 8.11. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3443(br), 1586(s), 1571(s), 1505(s), 1400(s), 1384(s), 1331(w), 1241(m), 1144(w), 1114(w), 1066(m), 1014(w), 933(m), 823(w), 782(w), 756(m), 721(m), 674(w), 644(m), 587(w).

Preparation of [Cd3(μ3-OH)(L)2(PBEA)1.5]⋅H2O (3)

Complex 3 was also synthesized by the same procedure as for the preparation of 1, except that CdSO4⋅8/3H2O (25.6 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2⋅6H2O as the starting material. Colorless block crystals of 3 were obtained by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 21.00 mg (0.018 mmol, 54%). Anal. Calcd for C41H33Cd3N8O12 (%): C, 42.20; H, 2.85; N, 9.60. Found: C, 41.55; H, 2.91; N, 9.42. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3446(br), 1584(s), 1568(s), 1506(s), 1396(s), 1364(s), 1330(w), 1267(w), 1240(m), 1114(w), 1067(m), 1059(m), 1016(m), 932(m), 826(w), 786(m), 758(w), 736(m), 703(w), 647(m), 587(w).

Preparation of [Mn(μ2-H2O)(L)(PBEA)0.5] (4)

Complex 4 was synthesized by the same procedure as that used for preparation of 1, except that MnCl2⋅4H2O (19.7 mg, 0.1 mmol), Mn(NO3)2⋅4H2O (25.1 mg, 0.1 mmol), or MnSO4⋅H2O (16.9 mg, 0.1 mmol) was used instead of Cd(NO3)2⋅6H2O as the starting material. Pink block crystals of 4 were isolated from the mixture by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times with a yield of 27.69 mg (0.034 mmol, 67%) for MnCl2⋅4H2O, 20.66 mg (0.025 mmol, 50%) for Mn(NO3)2⋅4H2O and 21.90 mg (0.027 mmol, 53%) for MnSO4⋅H2O, respectively. Anal. Calcd for C36H28Mn2N8O9 (%): C, 52.31; H, 3.41; N, 13.56. Found: C, 52.34; H, 3.40; N, 13.52. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3431(br), 1639(s), 1590(s), 1501(s), 1407(s), 1384(s), 1372(s), 1302(m), 1267(m), 1231(m), 1107(w), 1069(s), 1014(w), 927(m), 830(w), 813(w), 773(w), 705(m), 655(w), 601(w).
